name: MyNOVA
0:
”Alexa ask my nova what is project advance?”
”Alexa ask my nova if the school is open today”
”Alexa ask my nova how much is tuition?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my nova
Developer Terms of Use
des: NOVA's Alexa app let's you gather helpful information about things like curricular programs, tuition costs, building and department information and much more!
